Name: Blauwe Theehuis
Review Text:
It was nice. I love the place. Food is nice. It's not a very expensive, lovely view.
Only I do not like toalet. It's outside and feels like public toalet...
Love Amsterdam in general. At this place you can eat nice sandwiches and snacks.

Name: Blauwe Theehuis
Review Text: Located in the center of Vondelpark, the Blauwe Theehuis is a very fine and nice spot. Great terrace with enough shade. ‚Ä¶

Name: Blauwe Theehuis
Review Text: An amazing and cozy taproom offering excellent beers to very nice meals! Tucked away in the park - you will definitely not miss it and highly recommend trying there craft beer!

Name: Blauwe Theehuis
Review Text: A great place to stop for a drink or quick bite to eat. The place was very busy on a Saturday, but staff were efficient and friendly. Their hot chocolate was just what we needed to warm up after some cycling in the park.

Name: Blauwe Theehuis
Review Text:
Great food and sandwiches!  Employees so friendly!
Amazing selection of beers...found my favorite!

Name: Blauwe Theehuis
Review Text: Nice outside area specially in sunny days, good hot drinks and very delicious banana bread

Name: Blauwe Theehuis
Review Text:
A little gem in the middle of Vondel park.

Ambience: (4/5) ‚Ä¶

Name: Blauwe Theehuis
Review Text: Good beers, great location. Good coffee too. Very popular so might be all occupied when the weather is nice. The downside is the toilets that are in a cabin next to the building and look and feel somewhat makeshift, but at least they're there.

Name: Blauwe Theehuis
Review Text: Lovely place in the park for a quick bite and family time

Name: Blauwe Theehuis
Review Text: Stopped by for a Gl√ºhwein, which was tasty. Staff very friendly and they have heaters outside to make your stay very cosy :)

Name: Blauwe Theehuis
Review Text: So glad to be able to go back. The menu is great and they make the best lattes in Amsterdam.

Name: Blauwe Theehuis
Review Text: A lovely and beautiful place in the heart of the Vondelpark. A must visit! Ask for the special dairy (cappuccino,latte, ..) from the local farmers.

Name: Blauwe Theehuis
Review Text: Nice spot in Vondelpark but the menu sacks. Unfortunately you can drink there but not really have food unless you are happy with a pizza.

Name: Blauwe Theehuis
Review Text:

Name: Blauwe Theehuis
Review Text: Nice location to get some drinks with friends. Especially with great weather it‚Äôs a perfect place to go. They serve a lot of the IJ beer from the local brewery. The service for food could be a little quicker in my opinion.

Name: Blauwe Theehuis
Review Text: Great selection of drinks, the sandwiches are quite average (had a ciabatta) but the Irish coffee was delicious. Weird outdoor seating, seems quite unattended.

Name: Blauwe Theehuis
Review Text: Nice spot w/in Vondelpark for sure. Tables are separated just right (hopefully not just because of covid-19). Coffee options are limited: I wanted a soy latte, but oat latte was decent. Did not like the order from the bar system. They should allow ordering w/ the QR code instead of just a download of the menu.

Name: Blauwe Theehuis
Review Text: Perfect summer spot for drinks after your walk or bike in the park. Great energy and vibe.

Name: Blauwe Theehuis
Review Text: Love the vibe of this place. The beer and food is very goo, staff is very helpful (please tip) and there‚Äôs always something interesting to look. And it‚Äôs hidden from the tourists!

Name: Blauwe Theehuis
Review Text: A perfect stop while enjoying Vondel Park. Enjoy a delicious local amsterdam beer and sit on a gorgeous terrace enjoying good company and maybe even a match of üèì Ping Pong. It‚Äôs self service and very convenient.

Name: Blauwe Theehuis

Name: Blauwe Theehuis
Review Text: Laid back venue in Amsterdam's busiest park. Great local brewery, my favourite IPA. No table service but that makes sense. No queries, varied seating, P√©tanque area. Hot food served apparently but we didn't have time to try it.
